about_the_game:
For every action, they say that a different universe is created.

What if an action was done a different way? Was never done at all? These occurrences create an infinite amount of possibilities. Possibilities waiting to be brought to life.

Time DeTour presents a unique take on the Simulation Genre. Instead of manipulating space (building objects, etc) you manipulate time. By placing "Sync Nodes" at various points in time, you can spread your influence for good or for evil. Different node types will let you affect events in the past and see their effects immediately as your decisions ripple through the future.

Manage your time technology, choose the placement of your time nodes, and watch the future respond to your actions. For better or worse, you are in charge in this simulation of mankind, Earth, and the universe itself. Will you make the world a better place? Or worse? With emergent gameplay elements combined in a world where events are intertwined, every action you make could have unforeseen repercussions. Jump in, and take a tour of time.

name: Time De Tour

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 2Ghz Processor Or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 660 or Better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: By molding time itself, you can create your own universe! Influence the development of mankind! Any change you make early on in the timeline will have lasting repercussions later on. Will you create a utopia or a dystopia? Only time can tell!
